name: Balloon Sweeper
description:
Kapsule the Klown has lost his delicate balloons in the fog.

Can you find where they are without popping any?

Gameplay similar to a popular game involving mines!

Left mouse to clear, right mouse to set balloon guess.
Can be changed to one mouse button or for touch.

Can you find the balloons fast enough to get on the high score tables?

[3rd Feb - looks like High Scores may only be working with Firefox - annoying - looking into it]

Enjoy.
